title: Actually really funny
review: I just rented this on a whim cause I liked the poster. Surprisingly funny! Also surprisingly not very scary. The scares are more psychological and sometimes even funny themselves, which I guess they were going for? I'd definitely recommend if you want a fun, quick little indie film to watch. If you're looking for a straight horror, maybe choose something else

title: Like watching drama school stage theatre
review:
Only that crowd would call this well written, great acting, relatable, or art.
I suggest IMDB create a new category for films like these. Not comedy, not horror.. not worth any more of my time describing. I want that time of my life back.

title: It gets better
review: I nearly turned this off, but I'm glad I didn't. It's worth viewing and gets better as it goes on. A solid 7
